instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-01598 Wont load OS
threads.message:
Clean board, Apple logo comes up but OS never loads.

Reviving T2 gives error.

NAND voltages are present and correct:
PP0V9_SSD0
PP2V5_NAND_SSD0
PP1V8_IO_SSD0
PPVCCQ_ANI_SSD0

threads.title: 820-01598 Wont load OS
threads.message:
Any liquid sign on the audio board?
Remove and check it on both sides.
Touch ID may cause problems too.
Test the board with J6600 disconnected.

threads.title: 820-01598 Wont load OS
threads.message: All is fine with this Mac, I put it back in its case same thing, tried restoring again and same problem, I then put it into another Mac case and board booted up no problem, I then put it back in its case and it is working fine now, I did not even do anything, the only problem is that the camera does not work, but so far the Mac is working fine, this blows me away.
